long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with the Better History extension, a powerful tool designed to replace your browser's default history viewer and provide you with advanced controls to manage and browse your browsing history. Discover the best searching, the sharpest interface, and the most useful filters for your history.

⭐ Key Features

(1) Efficient History Search: 
Quickly reference your history by jumping between days and hours with just a click.

(2) Easy History Deletion: 
Deleting a day, hour, or individual visit is painless. You can also delete by keyword or any single domain visits.

(3) Unified View: 
Merges your visits and downloads in one easy-to-view interface.

(4) Advanced Search Capabilities: 
Regular expression searching is now supported, making it easier to find specific entries.

(5) Context Menus: 
Search your history fast by page title or URL via context menus. Each match is highlighted in the search results for clarity. Use the right-click options to search highlighted text on a page or by a site's domain.

(6) Dark Mode: 
Stay focused with an eye-friendly dark mode.

⭐ Permission Justifications

- History: Adds more controls to manage and browse history.
- Storage: Save extension settings.
- Tabs: Use the right-click options on any website to search text in the history viewer.
- Sessions: Show history from all devices.

⭐ Data Privacy Policy
We do not track any of your data, usage of this extension, or any website usage. Your extension settings are exclusively stored inside your browser. We never touch or see this data.

Feel free to contact us if you have any questions or concerns about data privacy; we are happy to help.

With the Better History extension, managing your browsing data has never been easier. From efficient history search to advanced history filters and a user-friendly interface, take control of your browsing history like never before. Install Better History today and experience a smarter way to manage your web history.
